name: Vitamins
description: Displays the dietary source and benefits for each vitamin

Source.val: Cod, eggs, milk, meat, cheese, liver, sweet potatoes
Almonds, eggs, sesame seeds, squid, spinach
Fish, red meat, chicken, peanuts, sunflower seeds
Chickpeas, fish, red meat, chicken, bananas, pistachios
Shellfish, fish, soy products, red meat, cheese
Red pepper, citrus fruits, kiwifruit, broccoli, kale
Oily fish, tofu, dairy products, soymilk
Sunflower seeds, almonds, olive oil, broccoli
Leafy green vegetables, soybeans cooked, pickles, blueberries

Benefits.val: Supports vision, skin, bone and tooth growth, immunity and reproduction
Supports energy metabolism, normal vision and skin health
Supports energy metabolism, skin health, nervous system and digestive system
Amino acid and fatty acid metabolism, red blood cell production
Used in new cell synthesis, helps break down fatty acids and amino acids, supports nerve cell maintenance
Supports the growth and repair of body tissue
Antioxidant, regulation of oxidation reactions, supports cell membrane stabilization
Synthesis of blood-clotting proteins, regulates blood calcium
